hero.header: Your Trusted Partner in High Quality Maklon Services
hero.subHeader: Specializing in the production of high-quality, private-label goods, we offer tailored manufacturing solutions to meet your business needs.

expertiseHero.subHeader: We are not just producing your products, but also helping you build your product from scratch

customFormulation.title: Custom Formulation
customFormulation.description: We offer custom formulation services using high quality materials, ensuring your unique vision comes to life.

blendingAndPackaging.title: Blending and Packaging
blendingAndPackaging.description: Our state-of-the-art facilities handle a range of blending and packaging options to suit different product types and quantities.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: We adhere to stringent quality control measures and industry standards, guaranteeing that your products are safe, consistent, and compliant.

privateLabelSolution.title: Private Label Solutions
privateLabelSolution.description: Expand your brand with our private label services. From concept to shelf, we support you at every step.

feature.subHeader: Why Partner With Green Life Harvest?

legalCompletness.title: Legal Completeness
legalCompletness.description: Green Life Harvest has given notable certifications to ensure our quality match with your vision. Our Certification include <black>BPOM, Halal, ISO 22000, ISO 22716, ISO 9001, HAACP, CPOTB, CPKB, CPPOB</black>, and <black>GMP</black> Certification

experience.title: 20 Years of Experience
experience.description: Our <black>20 years of experience</black> brings us as one of the most reliable Maklon services with 1000+ <black>entrepreneurs and brands</black> trusted us to bring their vision come to life.

lowMoq.title: High Quality with Low MOQ Requirements
lowMoq.description: We prioritize quality above all else when creating your product. Our state-of-the-art facilities ensure that only high-quality materials are used. Plus, we can accommodate a low MOQ for your product.

video.header: We are committed to being the best partner for your brand's growth.
video.subHeader: <bold>Greenlife Harvest Group</bold> is a leading private label manufacturer specializing in herbal products, supplements, and cosmetics since 2004. Trusted by hundreds of brands, our products reach over 50 countries worldwide.

1.title: Product Concept
1.description: Consult with us about the product concept you want to create according to your needs.

2.title: Determining Formula
2.description: Discuss your desired product formula and raw materials with our R&D expert team.

3.title: Sample Preperation
3.description: We produce product samples according to the best concept & formulation that you want.

4.title: Deal Price
4.description: A cooperation contract agreement for product manufacturing to be made and distributed in accordance with adequate procedures.

5.title: Choosing Packaging
5.description: Discuss packaging design with our best designer team to support your brand & customer appeal.

6.title: Stability & Compatibility Test
6.description: We perform a series of tests to ensure the formula will not change when filled into your product packaging.

7.title: Product License Registration
7.description: Our team will help you process BPOM, HKI, and HALAL permits for your product until it's market-ready!

8.title: Production & Manufacture
8.description: Choose us as your brand partner. We create your products with national and international standards.

9.title: Product Shipping
9.description: We will send your products ready for distribution & marketing on time.

productAvailable.header: Tailored Products Available at Harvest Group

1.title: Fiber Drink
1.description: Boost digestive health with high-fiber drinks tailored to your brand's needs. Our fiber-based formulations help in maintaining gut health and provide essential nutrients for daily wellness.

2.title: Meal Replacement
2.description: Create balanced meal replacement products that offer complete nutrition for those on the go. Our options include protein-packed shakes and fortified powders to support weight management and fitness goals.

3.title: Skincare & Cosmetics
3.description: Develop premium skincare and cosmetic products, from cleansers and moisturizers to specialized treatments. Our formulations focus on efficacy and safety, ensuring high customer satisfaction.

4.title: Collagen-based Drink
4.description: Support beauty from within with our collagen-based drinks, designed to enhance skin elasticity and hydration. We provide customizable formulas rich in peptides and vitamins for optimal results.

5.title: Collustrum Milk
5.description: Leverage the power of colostrum for immune support with our specialized colostrum milk products. Rich in antibodies and growth factors, these products are perfect for health-focused brands.

6.title: Whey Protein
6.description: Formulate high-quality whey protein products for fitness enthusiasts and athletes. Our whey protein options come in various flavors and compositions, ideal for muscle recovery and strength building.

footer.aboutHarvest: Harvest Group is a premier MAKLON manufacturer in Indonesia and Malaysia, specializing in a diverse array of health food products, nutritional supplements, and our latest offering in cosmetics and skincare production.
